languages.text: {n}Соломон долго смотрит на вас, прежде чем продолжить.{/n} "Если маршал узнает о произошедшем, это сильно осложнит жизнь… для всех. Будет лучше, если вы перечеркнете преступление Леди Теодоры таким способом: отправьте часть десятины в качестве поддержки пострадавшим мирам Простора, а остальное доставьте в Администратум".

{n}Solomorne gives you a long look before continuing:{/n} "If the Marshal learns the whole truth, it will make things difficult... for everyone. It is better that you redress Theodora's crime by sending part of the tithe to support the afflicted worlds of the Expanse and delivering the rest to the Administratum."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон долго смотрит на вас, прежде чем продолжить.{/n} "Если маршал узнает о произошедшем, это сильно осложнит жизнь… для всех. Будет лучше, если вы перечеркнете преступление Леди Теодоры таким способом: отправьте часть десятины в качестве поддержки пострадавшим мирам Простора, а остальное доставьте в Администратум".

It is better that you redress Theodora's crime by sending part of the tithe to support the afflicted worlds of the Expanse and delivering the rest to the Administratum."

It is better that you redress Theodora's crime by sending part of the tithe to support the afflicted worlds of the Expanse and delivering the rest to the Administratum."

It is better that you redress Theodora's crime by sending part of the tithe to support the afflicted worlds of the Expanse and delivering the rest to the Administratum."

It is better that you redress Theodora's crime by sending part of the tithe to support the afflicted worlds of the Expanse and delivering the rest to the Administratum."

{n}Solomorne gives you a long look before continuing:{/n} "If the Marshal learns the whole truth, it will make things difficult... for everyone. It is better that you redress Theodora's crime by sending part of the tithe to support the afflicted worlds of the Expanse and delivering the rest to the Administratum."

{n}Solomorne gives you a long look before continuing:{/n} "If the Marshal learns the whole truth, it will make things difficult... for everyone. It is better that you redress Theodora's crime by sending part of the tithe to support the afflicted worlds of the Expanse and delivering the rest to the Administratum."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne te observa durante unos largos instantes antes de continuar:{/n} «Si el Mariscal descubre toda la verdad, la situación se complicará... para todos. Sería mejor que compensara el crimen de Theodora enviando parte del diezmo a los mundos de la Extensión en peor estado y entregando el resto al Administratum».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a long look before continuing:{/n} "If the Marshal learns the whole truth, it will make things difficult... for everyone. It is better that you redress Theodora's crime by sending part of the tithe to support the afflicted worlds of the Expanse and delivering the rest to the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne te observa durante unos largos instantes antes de continuar:{/n} «Si el Mariscal descubre toda la verdad, la situación se complicará... para todos. Sería mejor que compensara el crimen de Theodora enviando parte del diezmo a los mundos de la Extensión en peor estado y entregando el resto al Administratum».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙意味深长地看了你很久，之后才继续开口。{/n}“如果把真相对元帅和盘托出，接下来的情况……所有人的处境都会很尴尬。因此，你最好能对西奥多拉的罪行加以利用，挪用部分什一税，援助科罗努斯扩区众多遭受灾难的世界，将其余的部分交还给内政部。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a long look before continuing:{/n} "If the Marshal learns the whole truth, it will make things difficult... for everyone. It is better that you redress Theodora's crime by sending part of the tithe to support the afflicted worlds of the Expanse and delivering the rest to the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙意味深长地看了你很久，之后才继续开口。{/n}“如果把真相对元帅和盘托出，接下来的情况……所有人的处境都会很尴尬。因此，你最好能对西奥多拉的罪行加以利用，挪用部分什一税，援助科罗努斯扩区众多遭受灾难的世界，将其余的部分交还给内政部。”

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは続けるまえに長い間あなたを見る。{/n}「もし将帥が真実を把握すれば、誰にとっても厄介なことになるでしょう。苦しんでいるエキスパンスの世界を支援するために、租税の一部を送り、残りを行政局に届けることでシオドーラの罪を正すほうが良い選択だと思います」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a long look before continuing:{/n} "If the Marshal learns the whole truth, it will make things difficult... for everyone. It is better that you redress Theodora's crime by sending part of the tithe to support the afflicted worlds of the Expanse and delivering the rest to the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは続けるまえに長い間あなたを見る。{/n}「もし将帥が真実を把握すれば、誰にとっても厄介なことになるでしょう。苦しんでいるエキスパンスの世界を支援するために、租税の一部を送り、残りを行政局に届けることでシオドーラの罪を正すほうが良い選択だと思います」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne sieht dich lange an, ehe er fortfährt:{/n} "Sollte der Marschall die ganze Wahrheit erfahren, wird es schwierig ... für alle. Es wäre besser, Theodoras Verbrechen ungeschehen zu machen, indem Ihr mit einem Teil des Zehnts die betroffenen Welten der Ausdehnung unterstützt und den Rest dem Administratum übergebt."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a long look before continuing:{/n} "If the Marshal learns the whole truth, it will make things difficult... for everyone. It is better that you redress Theodora's crime by sending part of the tithe to support the afflicted worlds of the Expanse and delivering the rest to the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sieht dich lange an, ehe er fortfährt:{/n} "Sollte der Marschall die ganze Wahrheit erfahren, wird es schwierig ... für alle. Es wäre besser, Theodoras Verbrechen ungeschehen zu machen, indem Ihr mit einem Teil des Zehnts die betroffenen Welten der Ausdehnung unterstützt und den Rest dem Administratum übergebt."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne vous adresse un long regard avant de poursuivre :{/n} « Si le maréchal apprend toute la vérité, cela risque de compliquer les choses... pour toutes les parties concernées. Il serait préférable que vous rachetiez le crime de Théodora en prélevant une partie de la dîme au profit des mondes en difficulté dans les Étendues avant de livrer le reste à l'Administratum. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a long look before continuing:{/n} "If the Marshal learns the whole truth, it will make things difficult... for everyone. It is better that you redress Theodora's crime by sending part of the tithe to support the afflicted worlds of the Expanse and delivering the rest to the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne vous adresse un long regard avant de poursuivre :{/n} « Si le maréchal apprend toute la vérité, cela risque de compliquer les choses... pour toutes les parties concernées. Il serait préférable que vous rachetiez le crime de Théodora en prélevant une partie de la dîme au profit des mondes en difficulté dans les Étendues avant de livrer le reste à l'Administratum. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne sana uzun bir bakış atıp sonrasında sözlerine devam ediyor.{/n} "Miralay'ın gerçekleri öğrenmesi hiçbirimiz için iyi olmaz. Aşarın bir kısmını olan bitenden etkilenen Enginlik dünyalarına göndermeniz, kalanını ise Administratum'a teslim ederek Theodora'nın suçlarını telafi etmeniz daha iyi olacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a long look before continuing:{/n} "If the Marshal learns the whole truth, it will make things difficult... for everyone. It is better that you redress Theodora's crime by sending part of the tithe to support the afflicted worlds of the Expanse and delivering the rest to the Administratum."

Aşarın bir kısmını olan bitenden etkilenen Enginlik dünyalarına göndermeniz, kalanını ise Administratum'a teslim ederek Theodora'nın suçlarını telafi etmeniz daha iyi olacaktır."
